sub_title: Business Program Manager (PMP) | Passionate About Delivering Business Value
summary:
Mark at a glance:
*  15 years of professional Program and Project Management experience; certified PMP & Prince2; Bachelors in Computer Science and Business Information Systems.
*  A breadth of experience managing Agile, Waterfall and hybrid type projects.
*  Extensive experience managing global remote and cross-functional teams to deliver successfully.
*  References have said this about Mark: “actively involved in driving and contributing to delivery”; “extremely technically competent and learns new technologies quickly”; “capable, thorough and well organized”; “fresh style of thinking and honesty”
*  Mark is passionate about delivering Business Value

Mobile: +31687234895  |  Email: career@markg.co.za

awards:
[{'title': 'Philips Eager to Improve and Inspire', 'description': 'Thank you for the tireless efforts to improve our UAT process and deliver a highly successful result.  The level of visibility and control we have thanks to your drive is really inspiring the program to improve other areas.', 'issuer': 'Alan Robertson - Business Architect and Release Manager', 'date': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, {'title': 'Philips Team Up to Win', 'description': "Thank you for the great organization. You've built and led a team for our largest ever UAT, maintaining a strong structure with clear reporting - making it easy for teams to function at their best.", 'issuer': 'Alan Robertson - Business Architect and Release Manager', 'date': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, {'title': 'Clicks Group AfriCan Achievement Award', 'description': '..for his professionalism, tenacity and ‘can do’ attitude, in the execution of ‘Sorbet Gift
Card’ project particularly over a period (Christmas) when it becomes significantly
challenging to keep parties focussed and committed to delivery. To this end, Mark did
not wait for any instruction to get third party issues resolved, he got into his car, met
the at the third party offices and ensured misunderstandings were resolved
collaboratively. Further to this, on hearing that the “Sorbet Gift Cards” were still at the
Distribution Centre and were not in the pilot stores, Mark ensured that these cards
were collected and delivered to the store to ensure nothing prevented his
implementation of the project. Well done Mark, great to have such an inspirational
colleague', 'issuer': 'Whisaal Tiki – Head of Project Delivery Management ', 'date': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, {'title': 'Nielsen Simply Excellent Gold Award', 'description': '"Since joining Nielsen in October 2011, Mark as PM on the Reach and Read Africa Expansion program has driven integration cross functionally. Working for the overall success of the program, Mark has worked tirelessly with the various functions to reduce risks and to define new processes / ways of workings to ensure quality and timely delivery of the program in line with client expectations. Mark has also successfully implemented a number of reporting tools which have resulted in simplification. A superb start to his career at Nielsen!"

projects:
[{'title': 'Clicks OMNI Channel', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': 'Project/ Program managed Clicks OMNI Channel IT program comprising of Pharmacy services, new Mobile application and product enhancements.  Worked closely with Head of Digital, Business Programme Manager, Head of IT, Solutions Delivery Executive and implementation teams in Clicks IT and vendors: SQLi Commerce and TCS (Hybris development); Deloitte Digital and TCS (mobile application development).

The program included (in summary) delivery key pharmacy services on multiple digital channels and a mobile application on both IOS and Android to support business and customer expansion and retention objectives.

Team size:		15+
', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Mark', 'last_name': 'Gounden', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Business Program Manager (PMP) | Passionate About Delivering Business Value'}]}, {'title': 'Launch New Business Product', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': 'Mark project managed the launch of a new business product range.  He worked closely with Clicks Business Development Manager, Product Portfolio Manager, Demand Manager, and implementation teams at Clicks IT, EasyPay, Electrum, ESP Online and Sorbet to deliver on the project.  

The project included (in summary) delivery of new Sorbet gift cards within the Clicks store chain.  It required architectural changes to the existing gift card process as well as introduced new vendors.  Mark took on the project mid-implementation with no clear project plan nor a previous project manager.  He worked with teams to break down communication barriers and deliver on business objectives set out.

Team size:		15+
